Class Gym

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.umontreal.iro.ift2255.equipe13.Gym
  • public class Gym
extends java.lang.Object
    Shows menus and receives user input.

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      private boolean askConfirmation​(java.io.BufferedReader consoleIn)
      Asks the user for a confirmation by typing either "O" (acceptation) or "n" (refusal).
      private Professional askForProfessionalID​(java.io.BufferedReader consoleIn)
      Shows a menu asking for a professional user ID, and returns that professional.
      private void cancelSubscriptionToService​(java.io.BufferedReader consoleIn, Member member)
      Shows a menu allowing to cancel a member's subscription to a service.

      Shows a menu allowing to confirm a member's subscription to a session.
      private void createService​(java.io.BufferedReader consoleIn)
      Shows the menu asking for all the details needed to create a new service, and creates the service accordingly.
      private void deleteService​(java.io.BufferedReader consoleIn)
      Shows a menu allowing to completely delete a service.
      private boolean deleteUser​(java.io.BufferedReader consoleIn, User user, boolean isProfessional)
      Deletes a user's or a professional's account, asking for a confirmation before proceeding.
      private void doAccountingProcedure()
      Performs the accounting procedure, that is : - shows the EFT data; - shows the accounting report; - generates invoices and payment notices, and sends them to the corresponding users.
      private void generateProvisionalAccountingReport()
      Prints the accounting report for all operations since last friday.
      private User logInUser​(java.io.BufferedReader consoleIn, boolean isProfessional)
      Returns a User object corresponding to the email address typed in through consoleIn.

      Entry point

      Asks the user to type in a number from 1 to n, where n is the number of elements in the provided list, and returns the n-th element in that list, unless the operation was cancelled.

      Asks the user to type in a set of attributes for a user profile, and returns them as a UserProfileInput object.

      • deleteUser

        private boolean deleteUser​(java.io.BufferedReader consoleIn,
                           User user,
                           boolean isProfessional)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Deletes a user's or a professional's account, asking for a confirmation before proceeding.
        Parameters:
        consoleIn - User input stream
        user - User whose account is to be deleted
        isProfessional - True if the user to delete is a professional.
        Returns:
        True if the account has been deleted, false if the operation has been cancelled.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - In case of an I/O error

      • promptChoice

        private <T> T promptChoice​(java.io.BufferedReader consoleIn,
                           java.util.List<T> list)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Asks the user to type in a number from 1 to n, where n is the number of elements in the provided list, and returns the n-th element in that list, unless the operation was cancelled.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Type of the elements in the list
        Parameters:
        consoleIn - User input stream
        list - List from which to choose an item
        Returns:
        The chosen element, or null if the user typed a blank line
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - In case of an I/O error

      • askConfirmation

        private boolean askConfirmation​(java.io.BufferedReader consoleIn)
                         throws java.io.IOException
        Asks the user for a confirmation by typing either "O" (acceptation) or "n" (refusal).
        Parameters:
        consoleIn - User input stream
        Returns:
        True if the user accepted, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - In case of an I/O error

                            boolean isProfessional)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Shows a menu allowing to update a user's profile.
        Parameters:
        consoleIn - User input stream
        user - User whose profile is to be updated.
        isProfessional - True if the profile to modify is that of a professional.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - In case of an I/O error

      • promptUserProfileData

        private Gym.UserProfileInput promptUserProfileData​(java.io.BufferedReader consoleIn,
                                                   boolean showFormat)
                                            throws java.io.IOException
        Asks the user to type in a set of attributes for a user profile, and returns them as a UserProfileInput object.
        Parameters:
        consoleIn - User input stream
        showFormat - If true, a short explanatory text will be printed to show the expected syntax.
        Returns:
        A UserProfileInput object
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - In case of an I/O error

      • doAccountingProcedure

        private void doAccountingProcedure()
        Performs the accounting procedure, that is : - shows the EFT data; - shows the accounting report; - generates invoices and payment notices, and sends them to the corresponding users.

      • promptActions

        private Gym.ConsoleCommand promptActions​(java.io.BufferedReader consoleIn,
                                         Gym.ConsoleCommand[] actions)
                                  throws java.io.IOException
        Asks the user to choose among a set of actions passed in an array.
        Parameters:
        consoleIn - User input stream
        actions - Actions from which to choose.
        Returns:
        The chosen action.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - In case of an I/O error
